profile.title: Profile
profile.text:
For more than ten years I have been dedicated to the development of software and management applications. Although I started programming in Delphi and J2EE, I am currently focusing my attention on web-oriented technologies, such as HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, PHP, Linux and MySQL. Currently I develop applications in Angular and TypeScript, an ideal combination to create user interfaces. You can find out more about my work in my personal GitHub account:

github.com/gchumillas

If you want to request more information you can send me an email to {{email}}. I will get in touch with you as soon as possible.

photoManager.title: Online photo manager
photoManager.text:
I'm excited about photography and when I did not find suitable software, so I decided to start the development of an online photo manager. It is an application adapted for mobile and developed in Angular, TypeScript, PHP and MySQL. The application uses Dropbox services as an image store. You can find more information on GitHub:

github.com/gchumillas/petitphotobox

cms.title: Content Management System
cms.text:
This application was born from the need to create a "Universal Content Manager". It is a highly configurable application capable of managing the content of any web, no matter how it has been developed. The application was developed mainly in jQuery, PHP and MySQL. You can find a demo in:

gchumillas.com/cms
